long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Are you tired of constantly losing focus while trying to work on important tasks? Do distractions keep pulling you away from your goals, leaving you frustrated and unproductive? Say goodbye to those productivity killers and meet your new ally: FocusTug.

FocusTug is a simple yet powerful distraction-blocking extension, designed to help you stay on track and accomplish more. With just a click, you can initiate a focused work session and experience a whole new level of productivity using the AI distraction blocker.

Unlike other distraction blockers, FocusTug is dynamic and intelligent. By harnessing the power of AI, it detects distractions that don't align with your current task. No need to create lengthy block lists; FocusTug swiftly blocks distraction triggers and evolves with your work.

Install FocusTug to steer away from those unproductive rabbit holes!
